name: Yoke Light
description:
When three diamonds are gathered, clear time is evaluated with three stars.

There is obstructions "rock" that can not pass through and obstructions "light" that passes through the field.
The light gets damaged when approaching, but you can get through while receiving damage.
The rock does not suffer damage, but it can not go through. Can to play repeatedly It will be clear when you collect diamonds unless you lose your physical strength.
Let's find a route that can reduce the time by going through the light while receiving damage.
Then you will be able to receive 3 stars rating.
When you collect stars ...?

You can further dash with mouse click.
Physical strength decreases during the dash, but you can move faster than usual.

You will recover your physical strength by taking a diamond, so please consider what timing you will take. Features of this game
  • More than 50 stages
  • Casual operation
  • To play repeatedly
